scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Features: The N by t., Divine at Club Au Go Go, T-Rex: The Last Unicorn by Blake Christopher, Beat Music's Past, The Thrusters, Scorchers. Reviews by Greg: Architecture and Morality,Pete Shelly, Waitresses, Go-Go's, The B-52's, TV 21. Illustrations by Bill E. Widener. Time line of Lexington Punk, 1979-1981, by Gerald.
